duration_in_months: We will use the TIIP set by the Commission and will honour the TIIP and make it available to all teachers in a transparent and fair manner once the position has been filled. Only ‘international students’teachers who are residents of the Netherlands, Commission-sponsored teachers or teachers from countries where the TIIP is waived, will be considered eligible to receive TIIP if they become employed by the OBCS.
full_summary:
# W0135-22SA02: Providing Services for Civilian Officiating Clergy - Administration Chaplain
---

## Tender Details
| Field | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Title (English) | W0135-22SA02 Civilian Officiating Clergy RFP | Request for Proposal: Providing Services for Civilian Officiating Clergy - Administration Chaplain |
| Title (French) | W0135-22SA02 Clergé civil officiant DDP | Demande de propositions: Fournie des services pour un clergé civil - administrators de confiance  |
| Reference Number | WS4065873316-Doc4066953764 | Unique identifier for the tender |
| Amendment Number | 0 | No amendments to the tender have been made |
| Solicitation Number | WS4065873316 | Unique identifier for the solicitation |
| Publication Date | June 22, 2023 | Date the tender was published |
| Tender Closing Date | July 11, 2023, 14:00 EDT | Deadline for submitting bids (PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS A NEW DEADLINE DUE TO A MODIFICATION OF THE ORIGINAL DEADLINE) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | July 19, 2023 | Proposed start date for the contract |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2026 | Proposed end date for the contract |

## Overview
This tender is seeking offers from interested parties to provide services for the acquisition and support of the Civilian Officiating Clergy - Administration Chaplain to the Department of National Defence, 22 Wing, CFB North Bay.

## Service Description
The services required include:

* Providing administrative support for the Civilian Officiating Clergy - Administration Chaplain
* Meeting the requirements for the acquisition and support of the Civilian Officiating Clergy – Administration Chaplain to the Department of National Defence, 22 Wing, CFB North Bay

## Evaluation Criteria
The tender evaluation will be based on a combination of technical merit and price, using the following criteria:

* Technical merit: The ability of the Offeror to provide the required services in a timely, efficient, and effective manner
* Price: The total cost of the services provided by the Offeror

## Important Notes
* THIS TENDER IS NOW CLOSED. PLEASE NOTE THAT THE CLOSING TIME FOR SUBMITTING BIDS HAS BEEN MODIFIED TO JULY 11, 2023, 14:00
